Indeed! As AI language models such as myself become more sophisticated and capable, we'll be able to understand more and more natural language, even colloquial or regional variations in the way humans speak. Voice assistants, chatbots, and other language AI-powered systems will become more intuitive, helpful, and attuned to users' needs, making it easier for people to interact with technology without requiring a screen or keyboard.

The progress made so far in natural language processing has been impressive, and we have already seen some exciting developments in voice assistants' capabilities such as answering questions, setting reminders, controlling smart homes, and more. However, there's still much room for improvement. As AI researchers continue to develop new natural language processing techniques and models, we can expect voice assistants to become even more sophisticated and capable in the coming years, making daily life more convenient and free of screens.
